reviewText: What an awesome old fashioned video. To see the old songs sang again is just awesome. How wonderful they all look. It takes you back to where it all began, in the churches. A must have for any home gospel libraries.

reviewText: This is their favorite at the nursing home and mine also my 93 year old mom.  I play it all the time and they love it.  All the old hymns of the faith are on it. I was very pleased with the service and the product!  Thanks so much!
summary: I have this in VHS and DVD now and love them!

reviewText: I rate this DVD as one of best in the Gaither series. It took me back in time to what an early 20th century church service might have looked like. I really enjoyed it, especially The Spirit movin' through Buddy Green's harmonica playing.

reviewText: This was a strange purchase for me, since this isn't my genre and had never heard of the Gaithers. But one night I was channel surfing on TV and Lynda Randle had just started to sing God on the Mountain. Well, I was blown away and hooked. I stuck around for the rest and decided to buy the whole thing. What a delight. Set in a church that has superb acoustics, everyone looks and sounds inspired. This is one wonderful song after another. So even if you're not particularly religious or into Gospel music, get this CD, if only to appreciate a well done, uplifting couple hours. You'll find yourself playing it often.
Title: N/A
